name: zodiac-framework
description: Zodiac Framework - A Modern Web Framework

scripts.build: npm run clean && zodiac-compiler -p tsconfig.json -o dist -t all -m production
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && zodiac-compiler -p tsconfig.json -o dist -t all -m development
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.start:dev: npm run build:dev && npm run serve
